output:

```{r set-params, include=FALSE}
params <- rmarkdown::metadata
```


```{r panelset, echo=FALSE}
library(emo)
library(here)
xaringanExtra::use_panelset()
```

```{css}
d-title, d-byline {
  display: none;
}

d-appendix {
  margin-top: -10px;
}

.article-footer {
  text-align: center;
}
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE, 
  dpi = 300, 
  tidy = 'styler'
  )
```

```{css}

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Mulish:wght@200&display=swap');

.bio-title {
  font-size: 28px;
  color: #007cab;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.bio-subtitle {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-author {
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-date {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-packages {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-categories {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #808080;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.bio-back {
  line-height: 200%;
  font-family: 'Mulish', sans-serif;
}

.left-column {
  float: left;
  width: 70%;
}

.mid-column {
  float: left;
  width: 18%;
  padding: 2px 0px;
  line-height: 2.5em;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.right-column {
  float: left;
  width: 25%;
  padding: 2px 0px;
  line-height: 2.5em;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: #002e48;
}

.row {
  display: flex;
}

.tab {
  padding-left: 5px;
  padding-right: 5px;
}

d-appendix {
  line-height: 1em;
}

.social_footer {
  padding:-left -20px;
}

.row-icon-style {
  width: 1px;
  height: 10px;
}
```

<br> <br> <br> <br>

<div class="bio-back">
<div class="row">
<div class="left-column">
<span class="bio-title"> `r params$title`:</span>
<br>
<span class="bio-subtitle"> `r params$description` </span>
<br>
<pre class="bio-date">Author: <a href = `r unlist(params$author)['url']` style="color: #004a76">`r unlist(params$author)['name']`</a>, `r ifelse(stringr::str_detect(pattern = "Sys.Date()", string = params$date), format(Sys.Date(), "%b %d %Y"), params$date)`
</pre>
</div>
<span class="right-column">
`r if("R" %in% toupper(params$tech)){knitr::include_graphics("https://img.icons8.com/offices/30/000000/registered-trademark.png")}` `r if("PYTHON" %in% toupper(params$tech)){knitr::include_graphics("https://img.icons8.com/color/30/000000/python.png")}` `r if("SQL" %in% toupper(params$tech)){knitr::include_graphics("https://img.icons8.com/metro/30/000000/sql.png")}` `r if(sum(!toupper(params$tech) %in% c("R", "PYTHON", "SQL")) != 0){params$tech[!toupper(params$tech) %in% c("R", "PYTHON", "SQL")]}`

</div>
</div>
